thread.title: Stop Whatever You're Doing and Watch Beyoncé & Nicki Minaj's Live Performance of 'Feeling Myself'
thread.title_full: Stop Whatever You're Doing and Watch Beyoncé & Nicki Minaj's Live Performance of 'Feeling Myself' | Maxim

author: Kelly McClure
title: Stop Whatever You're Doing and Watch Beyoncé & Nicki Minaj's Live Performance of 'Feeling Myself'
text:
A good portion of the world is currently obsessed with going back to the future today, but I personally prefer to live in the present in which this beautiful, beautiful, (can't say it enough) achingly beautiful live performance video of Nicki Minaj and Beyoncé's "Feeling Myself" exists. The duo performed their collaborative song live for the first time ever at Tuesday night's Tidal X 10/20 benefit concert and it was truly a gift from the moon, the stars, and everything else that is good about being alive.
Watch this fast because they're pulling these videos down left and right. Watch it, memorize every moment, and then go dunk your head in a bucket of ice and take a nap.
Love lift us up where we belong...
